Title: The Contractor
Writer: Robert Foster (screenplay), Joshua Michael Stern (screenplay), Robert Katz (story), André Farwagi (story)
Actors: Wesley Snipes, Eliza Bennett, Lena Headey, Ralph Brown
Plot: Ex-C.I.A. Agent James Dial (Wesley Snipes) is asked to take out terrorist Ali Mahmud Jahar (Nikolai Sotirov), only to realize he's been set up by his former employer, Jeremy Collins (Ralph Brown).
